_comment: Created by ianb on 27/04/2015 18:08:12 using v2.5
title: How many people were referred to IAPT and how many referrals started treatment in each quarter?
analysis_commentary:
Please note the number of treatments starting in each quarter is not a direct subset of the number of people referred in each quarter, as some may have been referred for treatment in a previous quarter.

The number of referrals to IAPT and the number of treatments have both increased over time. In 2014-15 Q2 there were 293,847 referrals to IAPT, this is roughly 87,000 more than when data collection started in 2011-12 Q1. The number of referrals starting treatment has increased by roughly 68,000 in the same time and was 191,532 in 2014-15 Q2.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set
